attributes.action: Stop Umbrella companies from exploiting Britain's temporary workers.
attributes.background: According to teachers’ union NASUWT, almost a third of supply teachers have been forced to join an umbrella company in order to get work from an agency.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
